arts.ttl: 'Still doesn't': Brazilian media give their verdict on Gabriel's display in draw vs Venezuela last night
arts.sum: Brazil were in action against Venezuela in the World Cup qualifiers on Thursday evening, and, just as expected, Arsenal central defender Gabriel started for Seleção....

arts.ttl: Vini Jr. misses pen as Brazil draw with Venezuela
arts.sum: Brazil had to settle for a 1-1 draw at Venezuela after a quick-fire second-half strike by substitute Telasco Segovia canceled out Raphinha's opener for the dominant visitors in the South American World Cup qualifiers on Thursday.

arts.ttl: Vinicius misses penalty as Brazil draws 1-1 at Venezuela in World Cup qualifying
arts.sum: Vinicius Júnior missed a second-half penalty as Brazil was held to a 1-1 draw at Venezuela on Thursday, leaving the Real Madrid star still without a goal in World Cup qualifying. Vinicius Júnior had the chance to score a potential winner after he earned the penalty in the 67th minute but his low spot kick was saved by goalkeeper Rafael Romo and the Brazil forward then shot wide from the rebound.

arts.ttl: Vinícius is a star at Real Madrid, but why not for Brazil?
arts.sum: Vinícius is stellar for Madrid and is reaching his peak. So why has he not yet been able to translate his club form and status into success with Brazil?

arts.ttl: Bayer Leverkusen take trophy tour to Brazil after successful US trip
arts.sum: After a successful trip stateside in September, a delegation from Bayer Leverkusen has travelled to Brazil to present employees and fans with their Bundesliga, DFB Cup and Supercup silverware. The delegation, led by former B04 player and current managing director for sport Simon Rolfes and head of recruitment Kim Falkenberg, has taken their bounty to São Paulo as part of their official visit from 12-15 November, which will be the club’s second international tour of the year.

arts.ttl: When is Brazil vs Uruguay? Times, how to watch on TV and stream online
arts.sum: Uruguay go into November’s games sitting third in the standings - but on a run of four World Cup qualifiers without a win, or even a goal, in qualifying. Brazil will bid to avenge their Copa América exit to Uruguay when they host La Celeste in South America’s World Cup qualifying competition.

arts.ttl: When is Venezuela vs Brazil? Times, how to watch on TV and stream online
arts.sum: Having got their 2026 World Cup qualifying campaign back on track in October’s international week, Brazil now go to Venezuela in search of a third straight win. Chasing their first ever World Cup berth, the Vinotinto won two of their first four 2026 qualifiers - and drew 1-1 in Brazil on matchday three.

arts.ttl: Gabriel Jesus: What's going wrong for Arsenal striker?
arts.sum: Gabriel Jesus hasn't scored a Premier League goal since January.

arts.ttl: Vinícius back for Brazil and Martínez for Argentina in South American 2026 World Cup qualifying
arts.sum: All teams play again next Tuesday in the 12th round of games, when Argentina hosts Peru and Brazil has a home game against Uruguay. Argentina and Brazil will have two of their leading stars available again as South American qualifying for the 2026 World Cup resumes with the last two rounds of games this year.
